It seems to me that the only conclusion I can come to is that there is no reasonable prospect of this debt being paid within a reasonable time, said Simon Cowell Registrar Jacques. The Registrar said when the matter was before him two weeks ago, he had made it clear that if the debt was not paid a bankruptcy order would follow.
